message:
SYSTEM: OpenScienceOEG_Grupo_20161110.pdf: Página 12
Open Science
• Consensus tool
• Objective: Create / Adapt a citizen collaboration tool  where 
users can propose ideas to reduce light pollution
• Features:
• Based on Consul Application (Decide Madrid)
• Users can propose initiatives or create debates
• These initiatives can be voted.
speaker: SYSTEM
